Gomaa Frahat, onye a maara dị ka Gomaa, (April 24, 1941 September 24, 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme ihe ọchị n'Ijipt.
A mụrụ Gomaa na Eprel 24, 1941 na Cairo.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Rose Alyoussef na Sabah El Kher ruo July 1999
O sere ihe osise maka 'Maged' akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka nke Emiraty site na 1972 ruo 1979
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị mmegide Ijipt ebipụtala ya, dị ka Al Shaab, Al Ahrar, Al Ahaly, Al Wafd, na Al Araby.

O nwere onye nnọchi anya na New York, Cartoonists and Writers Syndicate (CWS) bụ ndị bipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihe karịrị akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin America otu narị na iri abụọ na ihe dị ka magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ iri abụọ na ise na Europe na Eshia
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa, dị ka International Herald Tribune, English Times, El Luvracion, Canadian Gazette, na ndị ọzọ, ebipụtala ọrụ ya.
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya dị na ngosi dị iche iche na German museum na Bonn na International Museum for Caricatures na Florida.

O nwere ihe ngosi nke ya na ọwa akụkọ Naịl nke akpọrọ "With Gomaa Every Friday", nke ọ gosipụtara, na-egosi ihe nkiri sitere n'akụkụ ụwa niile na mmeghachi omume ya maka ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a, ma ọ bụ mba ụwa, Arab ma ọ bụ nke mba.
O nwere ihe ngosi nke ya na Damaskọs, nke dị na Siria, na 1998
E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya na ngosi Europe na Bulgaria, Yugoslavia na Czechoslovakia
E kwuru na ọ na-eme ihe ngosi n'ìgwè na mba Arab dị ka Tunisia, Libya, Yemen na Dubai
A kọwakwara ya na ihe ngosi otu n'Ijipt niile.
Onye otu bọọdụ nke Egyptian Caricature Union kemgbe afọ 1984.
